DOC.brief_summary: The researchers aim to investigate the effect of memantine on stroke outcome in a randomized double-blind placebo-controlled clinical trial.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Memantine Versus Placebo on Ischemic Stroke Outcome
DOC.criteria: Presentation at first 24hrs of disease onset Confirmation of ischemic stroke in MCA territory by imaging. Accepted consent form Allergy history to memantine Stage 4 5 renal failure base on Acute Kidney Injury Network criteria Moderate to severe hepatic failure (ChildPugh criteria, grade B and C) History of epilepsy History of dementia History of memantine use in recent 6 months Pregnancy or breastfeeding Severe drug adverse effects
